nodes.text: Xantho Squadron was a starfighter squadron that was active some time before 35 ABY. The squadron utilized T-70 X-wing starfighters, at least one of which was later used by the Resistance. The X-wing retained its yellow markings that once denoted its service in Xantho Squadron.
Xantho Squadron was first mentioned in Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary, a 2019 reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo.
